original_title: Cricket World Cup: Pakistan will play in India
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Pakistan has consistently maintained that sports should not be mixed with politics, said the country's Foreign Ministry on Sunday (6).
It has, therefore, decided to send its Cricket Team to India to participate in the upcoming ICC Cricket World Cup 2023.
Pakistan believes that the state of bilateral relations with India should not stand in the way of fulfilling its international sports-related obligations. said a statement.
Pakistan’s decision shows its constructive and responsible approach vis-à-vis India’s intransigent attitude, as the latter had refused to send its Cricket Team to Pakistan for the Asia Cup, it noted.

"Pakistan, however, has deep concerns about the security of its Cricket Team. We are conveying these concerns to the International Cricket Council and the Indian authorities. We expect that full safety and security of Pakistan Cricket Team will be ensured during its visit to India." said the Pakistan Foreign Ministery.

West Africa tense as Niger coup leaders await military action by neighboring nations
Air Force training aircraft crashes in China Bay killing pilot and engineer
